description: List all tags for an accelerator. For more information, see Tagging in Global Accelerator in the Global Accelerator Developer Guide.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the accelerator to list tags for. An ARN uniquely identifies an accelerator.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Root level tag for the Tags parameters.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A string that contains a Tag key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A string that contains a Tag value.
